description: Try our easy to follow Blueberry & Kiwi Cooler recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Juice,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Blueberry,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Grape,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Blueberry & Kiwi Cooler Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Blend blueberries, kiwi fruit, grapes, mint leaves and 2 cups ice together until smooth. Pour into glasses, garnish with extra mint leaves and serve.
